description: Yippy, Inc. provides enterprise search and insight technologies for various customers of data in the United States. The company provides Enterprise Application Services Environment 360, a search-based application that offers organizations with a choice of public, private, and hybrid cloud options for internal and external content. It also provides Yippy Search Appliance that provides search technology, content connectors, security, user interface, and other solutions, as well as Enterprise Search Technology, which delivers business information. The company was formerly known as Cinnabar Ventures, Inc. and changed its name to Yippy, Inc. in April 2010. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Miami, Florida.
ceo: Mr. Steven M. Plumb CPA, CPA
